Class PharmacistView

java.lang.Object
view.PharmacistView
public class PharmacistView extends Object
The PharmacistView class provides the user interface for the pharmacist in the hospital management system. It allows the pharmacist to manage appointment outcome records, update prescription statuses, view medication inventory, and submit replenishment requests.
